      void MainGameEngineController.assignCountries​(CommandHandler p_command)
      This method contans the logic to assign countries to the players and start a game loop to deploy the armies for each player.

      This method contains the logic to add new continent to the map.
      void MainGameEngineController.editCountry​(CommandHandler p_command)
      This Method adds/remove the country from a continent using the 'editcountry' command.
      void MainGameEngineController.loadMap​(CommandHandler p_command)
      loadMap method loads the map already present in the resources to begin the game.
      void MainGameEngineController.saveMap​(CommandHandler p_command)
      Save map.
